home.title: Casa Chakras | Yoga Retreats and TTCs on the beautiful island of Cozumel
home.desc: Yoga Retreats and TTCs on the beautiful island of Cozumel
home.T2: Yoga Retreats and TTCs on the beautiful island of Cozumel!
home.T4: We offer Yoga Retreats, Teacher Trainings and Nature Get-Aways in the heart of the jungle of Cozumel. We can accomodate all ages and all levels - to make this a truly unforgettable experience for you!
home.T5: Casa Chakras is a beautiful oasis in the jungle with lush vegetation, many birds, flowers and ripe fruit to pick. We are located in El Cedral, the first original town on the island of Cozumel in Mexico - a peaceful and quiet place. The trees are old, the trails are friendly and the nearby cenotes are ready to be explored.
